<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> which <em>can</em> save its data to a circular buffer, or can pass it through directly to an underlying stream if specified with a buffer of zero. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// different stream.  &quot;Owns&quot; tells circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// it should take responsibility for managing the underlying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#abc8b7debcef19eb1c6c0dd39cec3f7f6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#abc8b7debcef19eb1c6c0dd39cec3f7f6">setStream</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;Stream, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Owns = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#a70524ecd20bbff380a56e850d7ad0f2d">REFERENCE&#95;ONLY</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      releaseStream();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TheStream = &amp;Stream;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OwnsStream = Owns;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// flushBufferWithBanner - Force output of the buffer along with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// a small header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream/#a1d35e899d253649e0248ab661f741fa7">flushBufferWithBanner</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// releaseStream - Delete the held stream if needed. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// transfer the buffer settings from this circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// back to the underlying stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> releaseStream() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TheStream)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OwnsStream)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TheStream;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end llvm namespace</span></CodeLine>
